attributes.action: Award a Post Humous Knighthood to Jock Stein
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people who sign this petition feel that the legendary Jock Stein deserves to be awarded a knighthood for his faithfull servies to football. The great man is best known for bringing the European Cup to Great Britain for the very 1st time.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Award a Post Humous Knighthood to Jock Stein."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12233.asp

Prime Minister's Office
